K-SASS-CORE

If you use Sass in your development workflow, you know the importance of mixins. When you see some things that are written repeatedly and tediously in CSS, that’s where mixins can help you prevent repetitive work. A mixin contains CSS declarations that you can reuse throughout your site.

There are many mixins are made by developers, to help you when working with Sass in your development. Most cover things that often repetitive in CSS. From adapting across multiple browsers to creating buttons, animations and transition effects, find this and more in the following K-SASS-CORE mixin libraries you should get for your Sass development.

Github

https://github.com/baonguyenyam/k-sass-core

Wiki docs

https://github.com/baonguyenyam/k-sass-core/wiki/Welcome-to-K-SASS-CORE

APIs

Danh mục
Padding/MarginBoxTypographyAnimationAll Sample

Padding/Margin

SASS:
.sample
    +pad(2rem_ '0 !important' 3rem_) // OR +p() OR +padding()
CSS compile:
.sample {
    padding-top: 2rem !important;
    padding-right: 0 !important;
    padding-bottom: 3rem !important;
}
SASS:
.sample
    +mar(5px 'calc(100% - 4px)_')
CSS compile:
.sample {
    margin-top: 5px;
    margin-right: calc(100% - 4px) !important;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    margin-left: calc(100% - 4px) !important;
}
View all paddingView all margin

Box

SASS:
.sample
    +pos(fixed, 1rem null null 0)
CSS compile:
.sample {
    position: fixed;
    top: 1rem;
    left: 0;
}
SASS:
.sample
    +bor(null, dashed color(main), 5px 4px_)
CSS compile:
.sample {
    border-top: dashed #795d9c 5px;
    border-right: dashed #795d9c 4px !important;
    border-bottom: dashed #795d9c 5px;
    border-left: dashed #795d9c 4px !important;
}
SASS:
.sample
    +bor-rad(0_ 'calc(100% - 12px)_')
CSS compile:
.sample {
    border-top-left-radius: 0 !important;
    border-top-right-radius: calc(100% - 12px) !important;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 2rem;
}
View all positionView all borderView all border radiusView all before-after

Typography

SASS:
.sample
    +visually-hidden
CSS compile:
.sample {
    margin: -1px;
    padding: 0;
    width: 1px;
    height: 1px;
    overflow: hidden;
    clip: rect(0 0 0 0);
    clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
    position: absolute;
}
SASS:
.sample
    +vh()
CSS compile:
.sample {
    min-width: 100vw;
    min-height: 100vh;
}
SASS:
.sample
    +full-width()
CSS compile:
.sample {
    min-width: 100%;
    min-height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}
SASS:
.sample
    +text-sha(2px 1px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4))
CSS compile:
.sample {
    text-shadow: 2px 1px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
}
SASS:
.sample
    +box-sha(2px 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4), inset)
CSS compile:
.sample {
    -webkit-box-shadow: inset 2px 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
    -ms-box-shadow: inset 2px 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
    -o-box-shadow: inset 2px 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
    box-shadow: inset 2px 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
}
SASS:
.sample
    +lh(1.5)
    +fz(2rem)
    +fw(400)
    +opacity(.5)
CSS compile:
.sample {
    line-height: 1.5;
    font-size: 2rem;
    font-weight: 400;
    filter: alpha(opacity=50);
    -ms-filter: "progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Alpha(Opacity=50)";
    -webkit-opacity: 0.5;
    -khtml-opacity: 0.5;
    -moz-opacity: 0.5;
    -ms-opacity: 0.5;
    -o-opacity: 0.5;
    opacity: 0.5;
}
View typographyView colors

Animation

SASS:
.sample
    +background-gradient(#FFF, #DFDFDF)
CSS compile:
.sample {
    background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right top, color-stop(0%, #FFF), color-stop(100%, #DFDFDF));
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(0deg, #FFF 0%, #DFDFDF 100%);
    background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right top, from(#FFF), to(#DFDFDF));
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, #FFF 0%, #DFDFDF 100%);
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, #FFF 0%, #DFDFDF 100%);
    filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#FFF', endColorstr='#DFDFDF', GradientType=0 );
}
View animationView input
